text.tspan: Goal: Given *all* measurement over all time,
compute the sequence X = [x[0], x[1], ..., x[T]]
of states that maximizes the probability given
Let L[j, t] be the probability of the maximum likelihood sequence
that ends at state j at time t
L[j, t] = (max_k L[k, t-1] * p(x[t]=j|x[t-1]=k)) * p(y[t] | x[t] = j)
Base Case: L[j, -1] = prior probability of j
